  9#ifndef VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_IIR_HPP
 10#define VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_IIR_HPP
 11
 12/***********************************************************************
 13  Included Files
 14***********************************************************************/
 15
 16#include <vsip/support.hpp>
 17#include <vsip/core/signal/types.hpp>
 18#include <vsip/core/profile.hpp>
 19
 20/***********************************************************************
 21  Declarations
 22***********************************************************************/
 23
 24namespace vsip
 25{
 26
 27template <typename      T = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
 28	  obj_state     C = state_save,
 29	  unsigned      N = 0,
 30	  alg_hint_type H = alg_time>
 31class Iir : impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal>
 32{
 33  typedef impl::profile::Accumulator<impl::profile::signal> accumulator_type;
 34
 35public:
 36  static obj_state const continuous_filtering = C;
 37
 38  template <typename Block0, typename Block1>
 39  Iir(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, const_Matrix<T, Block1> a, length_type i)
 40    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 41  : accumulator_type(impl::signal_detail::Description<1, T>::tag("Iir", i), 
 42                     impl::signal_detail::Op_count_iir<T>::value(i,
 43								 a.size(0))),
 44    b_(b.size(0), b.size(1)),
 45    a_(a.size(0), a.size(1)),
 46    w_(b_.size(0), 2, T()),
 47    input_size_(i)
 48  {
 49    assert(b_.size(0) == a_.size(0));
 50    assert(b_.size(1) == 3);
 51    assert(a_.size(1) == 2);
 52    
 53    b_ = b;
 54    a_ = a;
 55  }
 56
 57  Iir(Iir const &iir) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 58    : accumulator_type(iir),
 59      b_(iir.b_.size(0), 3),
 60      a_(iir.a_.size(0), 2),
 61      w_(b_.size(0), 2),
 62      input_size_(iir.input_size_)
 63  {
 64    b_ = iir.b_;
 65    a_ = iir.a_;
 66    w_ = iir.w_;
 67  }
 68
 69  Iir& operator=(Iir const &iir) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
 70  {
 71    accumulator_type::operator= (iir);
 72    assert(this->kernel_size() == iir.kernel_size());
 73
 74    b_ = iir.b_;
 75    a_ = iir.a_;
 76    w_ = iir.w_;
 77
 78    input_size_ = iir.input_size_;
 79
 80    return *this;
 81  }
 82
 83  length_type kernel_size()  const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 2 * a_.size(0); }
 84  length_type filter_order() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return 2 * a_.size(0); }
 85  length_type input_size()   const VSIP_NOTHROW { return input_size_; }
 86  length_type output_size()  const VSIP_NOTHROW { return input_size_; }
 87
 88  // Specification has both member function and member static const
 89  // variable with same name, which is not allowed in C++.  Since the
 90  // member variable can be used in constant expressions (such as
 91  // template parameters), as well as in situations where the function
 92  // can be used, we implement the variable.
 93  //
 94  // obj_state continuous_filtering() const VSIP_NOTHROW;
 95
 96  template <typename Block0, typename Block1>
 97  Vector<T, Block1> operator()(
 98    const_Vector<T, Block0>,
 99    Vector<T, Block1>)
100    VSIP_NOTHROW;
101
102  void reset() VSIP_NOTHROW { w_ = T();}
103
104public:
105
106  float impl_performance(char const * what) const  VSIP_NOTHROW
107  {
108    if      (!strcmp(what, "mops"))  return this->event_.mflops();
109    else if (!strcmp(what, "time"))  return this->event_.total();
110    else if (!strcmp(what, "count")) return this->event_.count();
111    else return 0.f;
112  }
113
114private:
115  Matrix<T>   b_;
116  Matrix<T>   a_;
117  Matrix<T>   w_;
118  length_type input_size_;
119};
120
121
122
123/***********************************************************************
124  Definitions
125***********************************************************************/
126
127template <typename      T,
128	  obj_state     C,
129	  unsigned      N,
130	  alg_hint_type H>
131template <typename      Block0,
132	  typename      Block1>
133Vector<T, Block1>
134Iir<T, C, N, H>::operator()(const_Vector<T, Block0> data,
135                            Vector<T, Block1> out)
136  VSIP_NOTHROW
137{
138  typename accumulator_type::Scope scope(*this);
139
140  index_type const A1 = 0;
141  index_type const A2 = 1;
142
143  index_type const B0 = 0;
144  index_type const B1 = 1;
145  index_type const B2 = 2;
146
147  index_type const W1 = 0;
148  index_type const W2 = 1;
149
150  assert(data.size() == this->input_size());
151  assert(out.size()  == this->output_size());
152
153  length_type const M = a_.size(0);
154
155  for (index_type i=0; i<out.size(); ++i)
156  {
157    T val = data(i);
158
159    for (index_type m=0; m<M; ++m)
160    {
161      T w0 = val
162	   - a_.get(m, A1) * w_.get(m, W1)
163           - a_.get(m, A2) * w_.get(m, W2);
164
165      val  = b_.get(m, B0) * w0
166           + b_.get(m, B1) * w_.get(m, W1)
167           + b_.get(m, B2) * w_.get(m, W2);
168
169      w_.put(m, W2, w_.get(m, W1));
170      w_.put(m, W1, w0);
171    }
172
173    out.put(i, val);
174  }
175
176  if (C == state_no_save)
177    this->reset();
178
179  return out;
180}
181
182
183
184} // namespace vsip

186#endif // VSIP_CORE_SIGNAL_IIR_HPP
